Serving Star with Pride

Star perfectly balances rural charm with modern convenience, attracting families who want space to breathe while staying connected to the valley. Lawns All Day provides professional lawn care that respects Star's agricultural roots while meeting the expectations of its growing residential communities.

From historic properties along State Street to new developments near the foothills, we understand that Star residents value their outdoor spaces. Our services help you maintain beautiful lawns that complement Star's natural beauty.

About Star

Population: 11,000+

Established: 1864

At Lawns All Day, we understand the unique lawn care needs of Star residents. Our local expertise ensures your lawn gets the right treatment at the right time.

Preserving Star's Character

Star's appeal lies in its spacious properties and rural atmosphere. We provide lawn care services that enhance your property while preserving the natural character that makes Star special. Whether you have a half-acre or twenty acres, we have the equipment and expertise to keep your property pristine.
